prompt_base: raw candid photograph, heavy set middle-aged caucasian male, (thick five o'clock shadow greyish beard:1.3), balding with wispy side hair, double chin, thick neck, tired realistic eyes, heavy eyelids, white polo shirt
feature_prompt: rough skin texture, deep visible pores, wrinkles, sunspots, hyper-realistic, unpolished, sweat, uneven skin tone, 85mm portrait lens, sharp focus, hard lighting
negative_prompt: yellow skin, cartoon, anime, 3d render, plastic, doll, wax figure, smooth skin, airbrushed, perfect skin, glowing, shiny, deformed, lowres
